extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that the iDisk access is disabled. The value to be verified will need to be specified when creating this extension attribute. Example: "true" verifies that iDisk access is disabled. This extension attribute requires this preference be set using Managed Preferences (MCX).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="EditFromTemplate_Desired_Value_-_Example:_true" appDomain="com.apple.finder" keyName="ProhibitGoToiDisk" currentUser=`last -1 -t console | awk '{print $1}'` result="" tmpResult="`dscl . mcxread /Users/$currentUser \"$appDomain\" \"$keyName\" |grep Value:| sed 's/Value\: //g'`" echo $tmpResult if [ "$tmpResult" == "1" ]; then result="true" else if [ "$tmpResult" == "0" ]; then result="false" else if [ "$tmpResult" == "" ]; then result="Domain or Key Not Found" else result="$tmpResult" fi fi fi if [ "$result" == "$desiredValue" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($result)</result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($result)</result>" fi
